suppress.notes: Suppress known vulnerabilities in FUSE libraries for fuse-nio-adapter. For more info, see suppression.xml of https://github.com/cryptomator/fuse-nio-adapter
Suppress known vulnerabilities in FUSE libraries for jnr-fuse (dependency of fuse-nio-adapter).

Suppress all for this javax.servlet api package: There are lots of false positives, simply because its version number is way beyond the remaining org.eclipse.jetty jar files. Note, that our actual Jetty version is different.
As long as we don't suppress anything in org.eclipse.jetty:jetty-server or :jetty-servlet, vulnerabilities will still trigger if we actually use an outdated Jetty version.
False positive for commons-cli due, see https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/pull/4148
